name: Gigasoft
overview:
GIGASOFT is an international software development and security company. GIGASOFT is founded based on the accelerating demand for security products for the protection of data and hardware, and is unique in its setup, offering the integration of software, Internet, services and 24/7 alarm centers.

GIGASOFT’s vision GIGASOFT will be no. 1 in the development of digital security products.

GIGASOFT’s mission GIGASOFT develops cutting-edge digital security products for the public sector, businesses, private end-users and for individual products.

GIGASOFT is presently working together with and selling its services to public sector offices at national, regional and municipal levels, businesses and to private end-users. Sales are made through direct contact, software distributors, IT consultancies, and to the private sector. GIGASOFT has a solid and rewarding dialog with the POLICE and other public authorities, which results in GIGASOFT having a constant focus and internal dialog on data security. GIGASOFT is fully compliant with all legislation in this area.
